post_title: SOLD T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait PSA Authentic
post_content:
No creases. Nice eye appeal. Excellent registration. I do not know what the alteration is, wish they would specify.
SOLDor best offer. pp ff, Zelle, or cleared check. No trades.
Plenty of references and successful deals here.
